attributes.action: give the taxpayers of this country an immediately legally binding referendum on whether or not we are prepared to keep the surviving Iranian terrorist from the SAS Embassy storming incident, in our country and support him by using OUR taxpayer pounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This man is a multi murderer and an Islamic fundamentalist terrorist.  It is a criminal act against MY HUMAN RIGHTS to use MY taxpayer pounds to keep him alive in this country after the killing he did, merely because he will be killed on returning to his own country.  THAT IS NOT A PROBLEM FOR ME OR OTHER TAXPAYERS, THAT IS A PROBLEM FOR HIM AND THE IRANIAN AUTHORITIES ALONE.  WE SHOULD NOT BE INTEREFERING IN IRANIAN MATTERS.  SEND HIM BACK TO IRAN IMMEDIATELY ON RELEASE IS WHAT I WOULD VOTE FOR.  THE PEOPLE MUST BE GIVEN AN OPPORTUNITY TO STATE THEIR OPINION IN THIS MATTER.  GIVE US A REFERENDUM NOW.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
